text: (1979) is a Japanese film in the Nikkatsu Roman Porno series. ==Cast== * Junko Miyashita as Woman with red hair * Renji Ishibashi as Kozo * Ako as Kazuko * Miyako Yamaguchi as Haruko * Kai Atō as Takao * Moeko Ezawa as Kozo's sister ==Awards== ===Wins=== * Best Actress, Junko Miyashita – Hochi Film Awards and * Best Actress, Junko Miyashita – Kinema Jumpo * Best Supporting Actress, Ako – Yokohama Film Festival * Fourth Best Film of the Year – Kinema Jumpo ===Nominations=== * Best actress, Junko Miyashita; Best director, Tatsumi Kumashiro; Best Screenplay, Haruhiko Arai; Best Sound, Fumio Hashimoto – Japan Academy Prize 1980 ==See also== * List of Nikkatsu Roman Porno films ==Notes== == Sources == * * * * * == External links == * * Category:1979 films Category:Japanese films Category:Films directed by Tatsumi Kumashiro Category:Nikkatsu films Category:Nikkatsu Roman Porno Category:Films with screenplays by Haruhiko Arai Category:Japanese pornographic films
title: Woman with Red Hair
